channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Whole road surface worn out from Greenway lane to Hales road, 22nd December
item.description:
The whole road surface is worn out from Greenway lane to Hales road and is beyond it's useful life and be like it now for years needs full resurfacing damage to vehicles everyday and getting a dangerous for everyone who uses it needs to make sure it's a priority to get done asap and not keep getting bodged patched work done
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes and uneven surface from juntion 10 m5 to past Junc 9, 21st December
item.description:
Trying to keep to nearside lane is impossible without hitting potholes and driving on anuneven surface. My car at one point flashed skidding on dashboard for one particular area of this stretch. I decided to move into middle lane until after junction 9 as this was much safer drive. Please coukd you repair this stretch, thank you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M5, Stoke Orchard, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
